short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to add items to a list, selecting an item at random as their decision

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Can't Decide in helping you making a decision of what you want on a website. Simply look for the Can't Decide icon, in supported websites, in the item you want to add then uses the plugin to review your options and make the decision. For none supported websites, just type in your options. Your options will stay in your list for that specific site until you delete it.
